sensortoolkit._analysis.pm25_nowcast.PM25NowCast¶

PM25NowCast(df, column=None)[source]¶

Generate NowCast values for PM2.5 1-hour averages.

References

https://usepa.servicenowservices.com/airnow?id=kb_article_view&sys_id= fed0037b1b62545040a1a7dbe54bcbd4

The presentation tited ‘Transitioning to a new NowCast Method’ by Mintz, Stone, and Davis (June 15, 2013)

NumPy (version >= 1.16.5):

Mathematical operations library

Pandas (version >= 0.25.1):

Data analysis library

Sys (Python version >= 3.7):

Python base package for system specified parameters

Parameters

  • (Pandas dataframe object) (df) – DataFrame containing hourly PM2.5 data.

  • (str) (column) – The name of the column to NowCast.

Returns

nowcast_df – Dataframe passed to function with added column for nowcasted values. The index is set to time. Data columns include the passed hourly PM2.5 data and the corresponding Nowcast values (‘nowcast’).

Return type

Pandas Dataframe

sensortoolkit
